QuestData.Title: Abel's Fate
QuestData.Description:
Maw Walker, I have another task for you.
Some time ago, I sent Soulwatcher Abel and a few others to slay some troublesome bonemaulers.
They have yet to return. Go find them, will you?
QuestData.RewardText:
So they were defeated? And yet, you still stand.
Shame.
